description:
Do all the things this winter. These insulated pants will take you through a full range of activities, keeping you warm yet mobile. Packed with functional design details including internal gaiters, pockets to stash your snacks and an integrated waist adjustment system for the perfect fit. The 2-layer VarioShell waterproof-breathable construction has a smooth polyester lining and a layer of warm ThermoLite insulation.

  • 2-layer recycled nylon shell with MEC's VarioShell waterproof-breathable membrane and critically taped seams
  • Shell has a durable water repellency finish (DWR) that sheds snow and repels light rain
  • 60g ThermoLite T3 EcoMade medium loft insulation (85% recycled) has high warmth for it's weight
  • Recycled polyester lining glides over layers
  • Zipper fly with integrated Velcro hook and loop waist adjustment
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees allow full range of movement
  • Internal gaiters have grip elastic to cinch around boots and keep out snow
name: MEC Do It All Insulated Pants - Men's
